languages.text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

traits.locale_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.
When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.
When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

languages.text: Ist ein Treffer erfolgreich, besteht die Chance, dass der Angriff stattdessen einen kritischen Treffer erzielt und doppelten Schaden zufügt. Diese Chance kann durch das Auspex des Schiffs beeinflusst werden.
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

traits.locale_text: Ist ein Treffer erfolgreich, besteht die Chance, dass der Angriff stattdessen einen kritischen Treffer erzielt und doppelten Schaden zufügt. Diese Chance kann durch das Auspex des Schiffs beeinflusst werden.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une attaque touche sa cible, elle a une chance de se transformer en coup critique et d'infliger des dégâts doublés. Cette chance dépend de l'auspex du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une attaque est réussie, elle a une chance de se transformer en un coup critique et d'infliger des dégâts doublés. Cette chance dépend de l'auspex du vaisseau.

languages.text: 命中敌舰时，您的攻击可能会触发暴击，造成双倍伤害。暴击几率取决于舰船装备的俄歇矩阵。
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

traits.locale_text: 命中敌舰时，您的攻击可能会触发暴击，造成双倍伤害。暴击几率取决于舰船装备的俄歇矩阵。

languages.text: Al asestar un impacto, existe una posibilidad de que el impacto sea crítico e inflija doble daño. La probabilidad de impacto crítico puede verse afectada por el aúspex de la nave.
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

traits.locale_text: Al asestar un impacto, existe una posibilidad de que el impacto sea crítico e inflija doble daño. La probabilidad de impacto crítico puede verse afectada por el aúspex de la nave.

languages.text: 攻撃が命中した際、その攻撃がクリティカルヒットとなりダメージが2倍になる可能性がある。この確率は船のアウスペクスによって変化する。
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃が命中した際、その攻撃がクリティカルヒットとなりダメージが2倍になる可能性がある。この確率は船のアウスペクスによって変化する。

languages.text: При попадании есть шанс, что атака окажется критической и нанесет двойной урон. Этот шанс также задается корабельным ауспексом.
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.

languages.text: Bir vuruş gerçekleştiğinde, saldırının kritik vuruş indirerek iki katı hasar verme olasılığı bulunur. Geminin uzgöreni bu olasılığa etki eder.
languages.original_text: When scoring a hit, there is a chance that the attack instead scores a critical hit and deals double damage. This chance can be affected by the ship's auspex.
